laws.full_text:
s allowed only to the extent they restrict the former employee from doing business with customers the former employee actually did business with (generally referred to as non-solicitation provisions)
New Jersey

Reasonableness requirement: Must be reasonable in duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited
Specific duration limit: n/a
Wage threshold: n/a
Notice requirement: n/a
Exceptions: Generally
laws.suggestion: Modify the non-compete clause to a non-solicitation provision, replacing the existing language with: "The employee agrees not to solicit business from customers with whom they had a direct business relationship during their employment with the company, for a period of [insert reasonable duration, e.g., 6-12 months] after termination of employment.

laws.suggestion: Remove salary history questions. Replace with: 'Please provide your salary expectations for this role, as New Jersey law prohibits inquiries into prior salary history.
